text: Miles Parks McCollum (born August 23, 1997), known professionally as Lil Yachty, is an American rapper and singer from Atlanta. ==Career== McCollum first received attention in August 2015 for his single "One Night". It peaked at number 49 on the Billboard Hot 100. Since then he has released four projects, Lil Boat, Summer Songs, Summer Songs 2, and Teenage Emotions. Teenage Emotions peaked at number 5 on the US Billboard 200. He has also appeared on KYLE's iSpy and DRAM's Broccoli. iSpy reached number 1 on the Billboard Hot 100 and Broccoli reached number 5. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:African-American singers Category:African-American rappers Category:Rappers from Atlanta Category:Singers from Atlanta Category:Twitch (service) streamers Category:American hip hop singers Category:African-American musicians Category:American trap musicians
title: Lil Yachty
